channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:41 Draw an alarm to the Zaporizhzhia region. Since further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:41 Draw an alarm to the Zaporizhzhia region. Since further reports.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
